import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import AOS from "aos"; import { createForm } from "../../actions/blogPosts"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; const ContactPane = () => { useEffect(() => { AOS.init({ duration: 600, once: true }); }, []); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { contact, setContact } = useState({ name: "Ade", email: "Kola", message: "Dayo", }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createForm(contact)); }; return (

setContact({ ...contact, name: e.target.value })} required />

); }; export default ContactPane;
